alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Dubois; Perry (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 3:41PM EDT until April 05 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Dubois County in south central Indiana... Central Crawford County in south central Indiana... Northern Perry County in south central Indiana... * Until 415 PM EDT/315 PM CDT/. * At 340 PM EDT/240 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dale, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Dubois, central Crawford and northern Perry Counties, including the following locations... Bretzville, Huntingburg, West Fork, Taswell, Mentor, Birdseye, Eckerty, Adyeville, Ferdinand and Huntingburg Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EDT/400 PM CDT/ for south central Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Louisville. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EDT/400 PM CDT/ for south central Indiana.
